trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Flagstaff
There were no other sightings in Flagstaff on or around May 31st 1969
divs: sighting detailsa woman driving toward the four corners area with her young daughter suddenlyhad a powerful urge to sleep. awaking 1 1\2 hours later, she observed a silverydisc, 300+ feet in diameter with a slightly raised dome, hovering just above theground nearby. she was instantly euphoric, then fearful. a telepathic voice toldher not to be afraid. the object tilted, then moved away slowly at first beforeextreme acceleration. the woman and daughter were both very nauseous for days,had a sunburn-like effect and hair loss.
Summary: CE with domed disc near Four Corners area.
